page.title: 10Education
page.content: In July 1985{Rusper Primary School}has 49 pupils.75% of the children attended a{playgroup}either in the village or elsewhere before entering the school. 60% of children leaving the school go on to the designated{secondary schools in Horsham i.e.Millais for girls,and Forest School for boys.25% go on to Holy Trinity School in Crawley which is C.of E.and co-educational,and the remaining 15% go on to a private secondary school of their choice outside the area.Almost two thirds of the children attending Rusper Primary School live outside the village,and many live outside the{catchment area.} This number is increasing,as there are very few young families living in the village,because property is so expensive.
